description.narrative: EPRP/DRR intervention is strengthened and reflected in all programs, and emergency responses are implemented in accordance with the CCCs,which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, South Sudan has an improved policy environment and systems for disadvantaged and excluded children.

sector.narrative: HSS - Risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks

title.narrative: South Sudan United Nations Development Assistance Framework
South Sudan United Nations Cooperation Framework 2019-2021
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2019 EO: UNICEF Response to the South Sudan Humanitarian Situation
South Sudan 2018 Annual Report on Results for Children
South Sudan 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
South Sudan 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: EPRP/DRR intervention is strengthened and reflected in all programs, and emergency responses are implemented in accordance with the CCCs
N. Of vulnerable population (women and children) reached with emergency response
N. and type of emergencies responded to in a timely and effective way
Contingency plan updated with tools for monitoring efficiency and effectiveness in place
